name: ▻Mahjong Titans Pro
description:
Game Overview

- This is a very simple game, you only need to connect the two together in the same Mahjong.
- This is a very happy game, you only need to eliminate all the mahjong is completed.
- You can not believe what I say, but do not miss, Download, happy experience.
- A total of 80 off the game, so you play to meet, have a good time.

Game Rules
- - A total of 42 kinds of patterns different game Mahjong are:
 Mahjong basis :1-9 cylinder, 1-9 Wan and 1-9 cords and east, south, west, north, central, hair, white,
 Mahjong season : spring, summer, autumn and winter,
 Plant Mahjong - plum, orchid, bamboo, chrysanthemum.

- Each one of mahjong, as long as they're overlapping with other mahjong together, and at the bottom, can not be selected.

- Each one of mahjong, as long as both the left and right sides of mahjong, can not be selected.

- Elimination of Mahjong is one to one basis, for example, ten thousand and ten thousand must be paired, two cylinder and two cylinder pairing must be eliminated.

- Season with the elimination of the plant Mahjong is similar pair, but not necessarily the same pair, for example, can be paired eliminate summer and winter, bamboo and chrysanthemum can be paired eliminated, of course, bamboo and summer are not paired eliminated.
